title: Travelhouse Underseat Hardshell Carry On Luggage 20" Lightweight Hardside Suitcase With Silent Spinner Wheels; Purple;  21" carry-on hardside underseat luggage; Color: Blue, Black, Orange, Purple, Green, Light Green, Light Purple; ABS hard shell, steel rod; Capacity: 33L; Size: 21.85" x 8.35" x 14.76" (L x W x H); Weight: 5.62lb; 360 degree silent double spinner wheels
descriptions:
Introducing the Travelhouse Underseat Hardshell Carry On Luggage, the perfect travel companion for your next adventure! This small size 21" carry-on hardside underseat luggage is not only extremely lightweight, but also easy to take with you wherever you go. Whether you're traveling, camping, going on a business trip, or heading back to school, this fashionable hard luggage has got you covered.

Constructed with a durable ABS hard shell and a smooth steel rod, this suitcase is built to withstand the rigors of travel. Its 33L capacity provides ample space to pack all the essentials needed for a 1-3 days trip. Plus, with the 360-degree silent double spinner wheels, you can effortlessly maneuver this suitcase on any type of ground, making your journey a breeze.

Safety is a top priority, which is why this luggage is equipped with a TSA lock on the side. This ensures that your belongings are safe and secure throughout your travels. Additionally, the textured finish of the suitcase prevents scratches, keeping it looking beautiful even after a trip.

Weighing only 5.62lbs, this luggage is the best choice for short trips and business travels. The top material used for every part of this suitcase guarantees its high quality and durability. The four silent and smooth multi-directional spinner wheels can accept a height of 1 meter and a weight of 60lbs without breakage. The TPR soft handle with a straight handle design provides ultimate comfort when you need to carry it.

With its elegant and practical design, this Travelhouse Underseat Hardshell Carry On Luggage is available in a variety of vibrant colors including Blue, Black, Orange, Purple, Green, Light Green, and Light Purple. The squared full-capacity design and interior mesh zip pocket ensure that your belongings stay organized and secure throughout your journey.

Don't miss out on the opportunity to fully enjoy your travels with this high-quality and reliable Travelhouse Underseat Hardshell Carry On Luggage. Get yours today and embark on your next adventure with ease and style!

This fashion hard luggage is constructed with ABS hard shell and smooth steel rod, very sturdy and durable. 33L capacity provide enough space to pack items needed of one person for a 1-3 days trip. The suitcase is equipped with 360 degree silent double spinner wheels for easy maneuver on different kind of ground. And there is also a TSA lock on the side of the luggage to ensure your belongs is safe to travel with you. You can fully enjoy the journey with these travel luggage sets!

Specification:

Material: ABS HardShell, Steel

Color: Blue, Black, Orange, Purple, Green, Light Green, Light Purple

Size: 21.85" x 8.35" x 14.76" (L x W x H)

* Top material for every part; 4x Silent & Smooth Multi-directional Spinner Wheels Can accept a height of 1 meter and a weight of 60lb without breakage; TPR soft handle with straight handle makes you more comfortable when you need to carry.
* Elegant + Practical Design; Features textured finish to prevent against scratches, keeping case beautiful after a trip. Stainless steels pull rod can be adjusted for three lengths.
